name: Revenge Of The Boar
description:
Goal:

You control a boar, living a life of boar, in a world of boars: big forests, boars friends, mountains, but also... hunters!

You will have to do your best to avoid them and, if you can, destroy them!
Run or jump on them to kill them and finally let this beautiful landscape free.

Approach the other boars and make friends!

Enjoy!

Controls:

"w a s d" or directional arrows to move the boar

Spacebar to jump

Mouse to look around

Escape to show menu and progression

------------------------ CAUTION : Required configuration --------------------

i80286 with at least 16 MHz

1024 Ko RAM

A VGA screen

Mono speaker

Keyboard with at least the keys "w, a, s, d, space, escape"

200 Mo disk capacity

Stable electrical installation

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
